attributes.action: Minimum level of service bill should cover MPs to prevent behaviour like Dorries
attributes.additional_details: There should be a minimum number of surgeries conducted and a number of votes attended each month, or the MP should have their seat removed and a by election called
attributes.background: The public should not be funding MPs who are not prepared to do their job.  The government are keen to force other workers to do their jobs during industrial disputes, they should lead by example

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641224
